name: Asociația Copyratul Român
goal:
The mission of Copyratul Roman Asociation is to contribute to sthe knowledge sharing, to the free speech and to be part of developing of free culture with an accent on Internet as a communication and creation environment.

We reach to the general public using using two approaches in order to fulfill our mission, awareness campaigns/events intended to inform the general public about the issues we identify, and secondly the establishment and growth of online communities.

As a added element we believe that we can provide relevant information to members of decision making bodies, in order to help them make informed decisions.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Protecția datelor personale, Dreptul de autor, Neutralitatea Internetului, Dreptul la liberă circulație, Drepturile fundamentale ale omului
